name: Break Out
overview: "Number 2043: You are imprisoned in one of the best prisons ever conceived. Any attempt at escape would be useless. that is why you must remain calm and understanding. (Circular for prisoners): You who, like us, are here, we advise you to run away from the walls that block your way with your cannonball as well as with your joystick connected to the port1 this one will give you freedom. Unfortunately the builders are smart and as you progress the walls will thicken. More at a time the bricks will move making the task difficult but do not weaken !!!! (The prisoners' committee)"
